```{r setup}
library(lubridate)
library(seasoner)
```

```{r}
x_start <- as.Date("1999-08-07")
stopifnot(wday(x_start, label = TRUE) == "Sat")
x <- seq(x_start, length = 500, by = "week")
y <- align_weeks(x, target_season = 2020)

data.frame(x = x, y = y)
```
